alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 4:16PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Allamakee and southwestern Crawford Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 413 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Harpers Ferry, or 10 miles north of Prairie Du Chien, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Prairie Du Chien around 430 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include County Roads A 52 And X 52, Highway 35 And County D, Wauzeka, Eastman, Highway 27 And County F, Limery Ridge, Bridgeport, Waukon Jct, Eldergrove and Lynxville. People attending Country on the River Grounds should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
